mapper.select: SELECT obj.object_name as tableNm , DECODE(atc.data_type, 'DATE', atc.column_name||'#DT', atc.column_name) as columnNm , atc.data_type as columnTp FROM all_tab_columns atc, (SELECT * FROM all_objects WHERE object_name = #{value} AND owner = 'DMSDB' AND object_type in ('TABLE','VIEW') ) obj WHERE atc.owner = obj.owner and atc.table_name = obj.object_name ORDER BY obj.object_name, atc.column_name
mapper.insert:
/* [chn.bhmc.dms.bat.crm.cmm.service.dao.BatDmsDataInDAO.exceMergeList] */ MERGE INTO ${tableNm} T1 USING (
SELECT
to_date('${dataMap[column.COLUMNNM]}','yyyymmddhh24miss') as ${sKey}
'${dataMap[column.COLUMNNM]}' AS ${column.COLUMNNM}
null as ${sKey}
null AS ${column.COLUMNNM}
FROM DUAL
)T2 ON ( T1.DLR_CD = T2.DLR_CD
AND T1.CUST_NO = T2.CUST_NO
AND T1.SEQ = T2.SEQ
AND T1.GRP_SEQ = T2.GRP_SEQ
AND T1.GRP_SEQ = T2.GRP_SEQ AND T1.CUST_NO = T2.CUST_NO AND T1.GRP_TP = T2.GRP_TP
AND T1.HOLD_SEQ = T2.HOLD_SEQ
AND T1.USR_ID = T2.USR_ID
AND T1.DUP_SEQ = T2.DUP_SEQ
AND T1.TRACE_GRADE_CD = T2.TRACE_GRADE_CD
AND T1.STATS_DT = T2.STATS_DT
AND T1.C_SEQ = T2.C_SEQ
AND T1.CONTACT_NO = T2.CONTACT_NO
AND T1.PLT_CD = T2.PLT_CD AND T1.TDRV_SEQ = T2.TDRV_SEQ
AND T1.PLT_CD = T2.PLT_CD AND T1.TDRV_VIN_NO = T2.TDRV_VIN_NO
AND T1.PLT_CD = T2.PLT_CD AND T1.CLINE_SEQ = T2.CLINE_SEQ
AND T1.CUST_CARE_SEQ = T2.CUST_CARE_SEQ
AND T1.TARG_CUST_SEQ = T2.TARG_CUST_SEQ
AND T1.VOC_NO = T2.VOC_NO
AND T1.VOC_NO = T2.VOC_NO AND T1.VOC_ACTIVE_NO = T2.VOC_ACTIVE_NO
AND T1.CALL_SEQ = T2.CALL_SEQ
AND T1.CALL_HIS_SEQ = T2.CALL_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.EXTR_DGRE_CNT = T2.EXTR_DGRE_CNT
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.BUDGET_CD = T2.BUDGET_CD
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.TARG_CUST_SEQ = T2.TARG_CUST_SEQ
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.SEQ = T2.SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO AND T1.POINT_HIS_SEQ = T2.POINT_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO AND T1.GRADE_CHG_HIS_SEQ = T2.GRADE_CHG_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.GRADE_SEQ = T2.GRADE_SEQ
AND T1.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ = T2.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ
AND T1.POINT_HIS_SEQ = T2.POINT_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ = T2.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ = T2.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO
AND T1.EXTC_SEQ = T2.EXTC_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO AND T1.CARD_TP_CD = T2.CARD_TP_CD AND T1.CARD_NO = T2.CARD_NO
AND T1.PKG_SEQ = T2.PKG_SEQ
AND T1.PKG_SEQ = T2.PKG_SEQ AND T1.CUPN_SEQ = T2.CUPN_SEQ
AND T1.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ = T2.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ AND T1.TRSF_RECEIVE_DETL_SEQ = T2.TRSF_RECEIVE_DETL_SEQ
AND T1.CUPN_PREN_SEQ = T2.CUPN_PREN_SEQ
AND T1.SEQ = T2.SEQ AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO
AND T1.CUPN_HIS_SEQ = T2.CUPN_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.CALC_SEQ = T2.CALC_SEQ
AND T1.CUPN_SEQ = T2.CUPN_SEQ
AND T1.PKG_SEQ = T2.PKG_SEQ
AND T1.PUBLI_NO = T2.PUBLI_NO
AND T1.CUST_NO = T2.CUST_NO AND T1.CHR_SEQ = T2.CHR_SEQ
AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ
AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ
AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ AND T1.ITEM_SEQ = T2.ITEM_SEQ
AND T1.STSF_IVST_RSLT_SEQ = T2.STSF_IVST_RSLT_SEQ
AND T1.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO = T2.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO
AND T1.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO = T2.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO AND T1.DETL_EXTR_TERM_CD = T2.DETL_EXTR_TERM_CD
)WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
T1.${sKey} = T2.${sKey}
T1.${column.COLUMNNM} = T2.${column.COLUMNNM}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(
T1.${sKey}
T1.${column.COLUMNNM}
) VALUES (
T2.${sKey}
T2.${column.COLUMNNM}
)

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.bat.crm.cmm.service.dao.BatDmsDataInDAO.exceMerge] */ MERGE INTO ${tableNm} T1 USING ( SELECT
to_date(#{column},'yyyymmddhh24miss') as ${sKey}
#{column} as ${key}
FROM DUAL )T2 ON ( T1.DLR_CD = T2.DLR_CD
AND T1.CUST_NO = T2.CUST_NO
AND T1.SEQ = T2.SEQ
AND T1.GRP_SEQ = T2.GRP_SEQ
AND T1.GRP_SEQ = T2.GRP_SEQ AND T1.CUST_NO = T2.CUST_NO AND T1.GRP_TP = T2.GRP_TP
AND T1.HOLD_SEQ = T2.HOLD_SEQ
AND T1.USR_ID = T2.USR_ID
AND T1.DUP_SEQ = T2.DUP_SEQ
AND T1.TRACE_GRADE_CD = T2.TRACE_GRADE_CD
AND T1.STATS_DT = T2.STATS_DT
AND T1.C_SEQ = T2.C_SEQ
AND T1.CONTACT_NO = T2.CONTACT_NO
AND T1.PLT_CD = T2.PLT_CD AND T1.TDRV_SEQ = T2.TDRV_SEQ
AND T1.PLT_CD = T2.PLT_CD AND T1.TDRV_VIN_NO = T2.TDRV_VIN_NO
AND T1.PLT_CD = T2.PLT_CD AND T1.CLINE_SEQ = T2.CLINE_SEQ
AND T1.CUST_CARE_SEQ = T2.CUST_CARE_SEQ
AND T1.TARG_CUST_SEQ = T2.TARG_CUST_SEQ
AND T1.VOC_NO = T2.VOC_NO
AND T1.VOC_NO = T2.VOC_NO AND T1.VOC_ACTIVE_NO = T2.VOC_ACTIVE_NO
AND T1.CALL_SEQ = T2.CALL_SEQ
AND T1.CALL_HIS_SEQ = T2.CALL_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.EXTR_DGRE_CNT = T2.EXTR_DGRE_CNT
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.BUDGET_CD = T2.BUDGET_CD
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.TARG_CUST_SEQ = T2.TARG_CUST_SEQ
AND T1.MAK_CD = T2.MAK_CD AND T1.SEQ = T2.SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO AND T1.POINT_HIS_SEQ = T2.POINT_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO AND T1.GRADE_CHG_HIS_SEQ = T2.GRADE_CHG_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.GRADE_SEQ = T2.GRADE_SEQ
AND T1.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ = T2.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ
AND T1.POINT_HIS_SEQ = T2.POINT_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ = T2.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ = T2.MEMBERSHIP_GRADE_CHG_SEQ AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO
AND T1.EXTC_SEQ = T2.EXTC_SEQ
AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO AND T1.CARD_TP_CD = T2.CARD_TP_CD AND T1.CARD_NO = T2.CARD_NO
AND T1.PKG_SEQ = T2.PKG_SEQ
AND T1.PKG_SEQ = T2.PKG_SEQ AND T1.CUPN_SEQ = T2.CUPN_SEQ
AND T1.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ = T2.TRSF_RECEIVE_SEQ AND T1.TRSF_RECEIVE_DETL_SEQ = T2.TRSF_RECEIVE_DETL_SEQ
AND T1.CUPN_PREN_SEQ = T2.CUPN_PREN_SEQ
AND T1.SEQ = T2.SEQ AND T1.MEMBERSHIP_NO = T2.MEMBERSHIP_NO
AND T1.CUPN_HIS_SEQ = T2.CUPN_HIS_SEQ
AND T1.CALC_SEQ = T2.CALC_SEQ
AND T1.CUPN_SEQ = T2.CUPN_SEQ
AND T1.PKG_SEQ = T2.PKG_SEQ
AND T1.PUBLI_NO = T2.PUBLI_NO
AND T1.CUST_NO = T2.CUST_NO AND T1.CHR_SEQ = T2.CHR_SEQ
AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ
AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ
AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_SEQ AND T1.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ = T2.SUBY_TMPL_QEST_SEQ AND T1.ITEM_SEQ = T2.ITEM_SEQ
AND T1.STSF_IVST_RSLT_SEQ = T2.STSF_IVST_RSLT_SEQ
AND T1.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO = T2.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO
AND T1.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO = T2.CUST_EXTR_TERM_NO AND T1.DETL_EXTR_TERM_CD = T2.DETL_EXTR_TERM_CD
)WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
T1.${sKey} = T2.${sKey}
T1.${key} = T2.${key}
, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(
T1.${sKey}
T1.${key}
, UPDT_DT ) VALUES (
T2.${sKey}
T2.${key}
, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO CR_1302T (DLR_CD, FILE_NM, ALL_YN, DMS_DATA_UP_DT, REG_DT, REG_USR_ID) VALUES (#{dlrCd}, #{fileNm}, #{allYn}, #{dmsDataUpDt}, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM')
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CR_1301T T1 USING ( SELECT #{dlrCd} AS DLR_CD , #{dmsDataUpDt} AS DMS_DATA_UP_DT , #{allYn} AS DMS_DATA_ALL_YN FROM DUAL ) T2 ON ( T1.DLR_CD = T2.DLR_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.DMS_DATA_UP_DT = T2.DMS_DATA_UP_DT , T1.DMS_DATA_ALL_YN = 'Y' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( T1.DLR_CD , T1.DMS_DATA_UP_DT , T1.DMS_DATA_ALL_YN ) VALUES( T2.DLR_CD , T2.DMS_DATA_UP_DT , 'Y' )

where.if: AND BAT_START_TM >= TO_DATE(#{sBatStartTm},'YYYYMMDD') AND BAT_START_TM < TO_DATE(#{sBatStartTm},'YYYYMMDD')+1

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM CR_1011HT
SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM CM_0101T T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CR_1301T T2 ON T1.DLR_CD = T2.DLR_CD

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DLR_CD, DLR_NM, OPEN_DT, DMS_IP_NM, DMS_USE_YN, ALIVE_YN, IF_SUCCESS_DT FROM ( SELECT T1.DLR_CD, T1.DLR_NM, T1.OPEN_DT, T1.DMS_IP_NM, T1.DMS_USE_YN, T1.ALIVE_YN, T2.IF_SUCCESS_DT FROM CM_0101T T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CR_1301T T2 ON T1.DLR_CD = T2.DLR_CD
ORDER BY T1.DLR_CD, T1.OPEN_DT )
